title: What is the green border around my champion portrait in-game?
body: Recently played a game as Anivia in ranked solo/duo and noticed a green border around my champion portrait to the left of the ability bar. Does anyone know what this indicates?

replies.body:
it means you're talking in your party's voice chat. 

riot is listening

> riot is listening

So far nobody has gotten banned for making high-pitched unintelligible noises.
